name: Pandora's Jewelry Box
desc:
[ Pendulum Effect ] 
[ Monster Effect ] While you have no cards in your Extra Deck, draw 2 cards instead of 1 for your normal draw during your Draw Phase.
pend_desc: While you have no cards in your Extra Deck: You can target 1 card in your opponent's Pendulum Zone; destroy it, and if you do, place this card in your opponent's Pendulum Zone.
monster_desc: While you have no cards in your Extra Deck, draw 2 cards instead of 1 for your normal draw during your Draw Phase.
